title: (Mon Full) Trying the Watermelon Mustard Trend + Lunchbox Calls Into a Bakery + Live Photo Leads to Guy Caught Cheating
itunes:title: (Mon Full) Trying the Watermelon Mustard Trend + Lunchbox Calls Into a Bakery + Live Photo Leads to Guy Caught Cheating
description:
We spin the wheel as someone has to try the new online trend of putting mustard on a slice of watermelon. Lunchbox uses Sam Hunt lyrics as inspiration for a custom cake to gift his wife. A guy gets caught cheating when sending a live photo to his girlfriend, and we talk about our best live photo stories. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
